feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: CE-LTS-2.50.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated validation logic to allow 'window.x' while treating standalone 'window' as a reserved keyword.
  • Refined keyword matching to ensure keywords are not part of a string or a comment and are exact matches.
  • child components on listView are not updating
  • form events: child components on listView are not updating
  • update the query refs for failed query

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: CE-LTS-2.50.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hotfix: Fix for canvas background color & reserved keyword by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10171
  • hotfix: Events with debounce are not working by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10196

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/CE-LTS-2.50.7...CE-LTS-2.50.8

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: CE-LTS-2.50.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hotfix LTS: Fix for duplicating the components by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10208
  • fix: updated parentId check to account for tab children by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10205
  • fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/10204
  • fix : table crash , codehinter not saving values upon page change and added delay to autosave as callback by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10205
  • fixes https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/issues/9974

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/CE-LTS-2.50.8...CE-LTS-2.50.9

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.62.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • App export modal loading state improvement by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9941
  • Component design system by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9191
  • Component design system inherit to platform pages by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10072
  • Improved invite flow by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9893
  • Bug fixes by @rudeUltra and @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10165 https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10172 https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10173 https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10156 https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10189

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.61.3...v2.62.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.63.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docker release workflow lts fix ce by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10068
  • LTS [Marketplace]: Appwrite patch by @akshaysasidrn in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10047
  • Correction in CE docker release workflow LTS branch by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10111
  • Performance release 0.1 by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9922
  • Hotfix [LTS] - Bugfixes by @arpitnath in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10146
  • LTS - hotfix: Fix for canvas background color & reserved keyword by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10171
  • hotfix: Events with debounce are not working by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10196
  • release: Performance release 0.1 by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.62.0...v2.63.0
